docker-test-arm.command: docker buildx build -f apps/mailcatcher/Dockerfile --load --platform linux/arm64 --cache-to type=local,dest=.docker/mailcatcher-arm,mode=max --cache-from type=local,src=.docker/mailcatcher-arm --tag philiplehmann/mailcatcher:test-arm .

docker-test-amd.command: docker buildx build -f apps/mailcatcher/Dockerfile --load --platform linux/amd64 --cache-to type=local,dest=.docker/mailcatcher-amd,mode=max --cache-from type=local,src=.docker/mailcatcher-amd --tag philiplehmann/mailcatcher:test-amd .
